description: What's better than a glass of wine on the hottest day? A&nbsp;frozen one! Icy slushies are all the rage now, and this tasty treat doesn't disappoint.With just enough sweetness to please those who enjoy sweeter drinks or want an extra kick in their step during warm weather months, it has your favorite flavors combined with berries right insideâ€”made even more refreshing by being cold as heck too!!
name: Frozen Sangria
recipeIngredient: 12 oz. Clementine oranges, frozen (3 if large or 4-6 if small)

recipeInstructions.name: Peel and section the clementine oranges and leave them in a freezer overnight.
recipeInstructions.text: Peel and section the clementine oranges and leave them in a freezer overnight.

recipeInstructions.name: In a blender, blend the frozen clementine oranges with the berries, red wine, and honey.
recipeInstructions.text: In a blender, blend the frozen clementine oranges with the berries, red wine, and honey.

recipeInstructions.name: Garnish with orange slices and serve. Serve immediately.
recipeInstructions.text: Garnish with orange slices and serve. Serve immediately.
